name: Colonel Thomas Reeves
role: Military commander of Changed quarantine operations
core_wound: Survived bioweapon attack in 2025 that killed his entire unit through infection. Watched friends die. Now believes any contagion must be eliminated immediately.
wants: To contain/eliminate Changed before they 'infect' all of humanity
needs: To see that the Changed are not enemies but victims - to choose mercy over fear
voice_markers: Military brevity - subject, verb, object. No wasted words.
Refers to Changed as 'the infected' or 'compromised individuals'
Rare moments of humanity quickly suppressed
Repeats phrases like mantras ('Containment is compassion')
contradiction: Sees himself as protector of humanity but increasingly brutal methods make him monstrous. Fights monsters by becoming one.
physical_description: Military-fit, buzz cut graying at temples, ramrod posture. Scar across jaw from bioweapon attack. Eyes that evaluate everything as threat or non-threat. Never unarmed.

relationships.Adrian Keller: Initially sees as useful intelligence source, later as threat to be eliminated
relationships.Dr. Okonkwo: Uneasy alliance - tolerates her research but ready to override with force
relationships.Sera Volkov: Views as Patient Zero figure - would kill immediately if politically possible
